content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ for your home service needs. Could I please have your name to get started?
John Matthews. I need some HVAC work done.
Thanks, John. Can you please provide the address where the HVAC service is needed?
Checking if we service your area, John. One moment please.
John, it looks like 1234 Country Lane is outside of our service area. We typically handle jobs within the city limits. Is there any other address you'd like us to check?
No, that's the only place. Can't you make an exception? The HVAC system's making a lot of noise but isn’t urgent yet.

I understand the situation, John. Our policy is to limit service within our designated area to ensure prompt service and support. However, I can check my calendar to see if we can fit you in under special arrangements.
Checking availability for a possible special appointment.
We have an available slot this Friday at 2 PM. Would you like me to book this appointment for your HVAC checkup? Please note extra travel charges might apply due to your location.
Fine, book it. But I want to know the full cost beforehand. I’m not a fan of surprises.

Understood, John. Because of the travel, exact pricing can vary. I recommend an in-person estimate to provide you with an accurate quote. Shall I book your appointment for Friday at 2 PM with a technician who can assess and provide the estimate on-site?
Yeah, go ahead with that. Just make sure they’re aware about the location so there’s no fuss.

Booking your HVAC appointment for Friday at 2 PM. Technician will be informed about the location and the potential travel charges. You’ll receive a reminder before the appointment. Thank you for choosing XYZ.
